column2: @LuneksView I would be happy to look into that! Follow and DM us your account number or address and city and I will take a look ^JB
@Shawhelp Your internet in Carstairs keeps dropping off and it is really annoying
@adams_ansible Sorry to hear you are having an issue Follow and DM us your account number or address and city and we will investigate! ^JB
Internet non-existent between the hours if 1700 to 1830 Mon-Fri @Shawhelp
@TELUS how fast can you come & install #optikTV in #StAlbert . We are tired of such poor service from @Shawhelp .
@eljeffe420 Nothing over the entire area I see Follow and DM us your account number or address and city and we will look closer! ^JB
@Shawhelp internet down in the north burnaby/coquitlam area?
@CBelitsky Hi Clint. Techs worked on restoring services as fast as they could. We feared the wrath of Blue Jays fans! ^Lance
Yes!! Thank you! That was quick! Ha @Shawhelp @ShawInfo
Come on @Shawhelp @ShawInfo the Jays game is on!! All hands on deck, to get this problem going in the east side of Saskatoon!!
@Norgyll Hi. We've just put up an alert at http:// bit.ly/1GqhYE9 If you're not in one of them, please follow and DM your address. ^Lance
@ronyatco Hey there, no information on if it will be included this year. If so, http:// shaw.ca/updates would have info ^MO
@The_Alex Hello Alex. We have all 3 "Back to the Future" available on VOD. Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads. ^TD
I wonder if Shaw VOD has Back to the Future 1 or 2.... CC: @Shawhelp
@candacehills Hi Candace. We've made it the best we can but I know it can still be confusing. Feel free to follow and DM any questions. ^LL
I am an English major and I read books that seem indecipherable to people but STILL I CAN'T FUCKING UNDERSTAND A SHAW BILL ?????? @Shawhelp
@KCudeht Hi Anya. No issues that I'm seeing. Could you DM me your address please? I can take a closer look for you. Thanks! ^Lance
@aimforsilence 2/2 example, told it to record new instead of all. Might be tagging in guide. Hard to tell at this stage. ^Lance
@aimforsilence 1/2 Might be guide didn't load properly or isn't sending right commands to record. Or might be how you set to record, for
@Shawhelp will do. Any reason why it skips recording scheduled shows?
@aimforsilence No guarantees. I've had success with it sometimes.But it's worth a try. Fingers crossed! But let us know if happens again.^LL
@Shawhelp well that's handy, thanks. Hopefully this fixes the issues I'm having.
@aimforsilence Nah, we have your acct info from previous DM. Resetting the PVR now. ^Lance
@Shawhelp thanks, and will do. Do you need any info from me?
@aimforsilence No need to be home. I'll do it now. If still issues after this reset, plz DM us and we can go over other options. ^Lance
@Shawhelp please if you don't mind. Should I be at home for that?
@ChristineETC Hi Christine. Thanks for the DM and I'm bringing up your account now. I'll reply to your DM in a few minutes. ^Lance
@aimforsilence Hi Myke. You can pull powercord 30 seconds to reboot it but factory reset would be on our side.Want me to do that for you?^LL
@Shawhelp Just sent a DM. Thank you!
@Shawhelp how do you factory reset the HDPVR DCX3510? Mine keeps not recording new scheduled episodes...
@Darren5200 Can you follow and DM us your address so we may take a further look into it? Thanks.  ^TD
@Shawhelp it is the only channel I am having issues with. All connections are tight and did a power reset.
@aprettylife Hello Joanna, there are no service interruptions that we are currently aware of. Can you follow/DM us your address? Thanks. ^TD
@Shawhelp Why is your internet service down again?! I'm in #yyc
@Darren5200 Hello Darren, is that the only channel you are experiencing that pixelation? Can you make sure the coax is set tightly? ^TD
@Shawhelp the weather network should not look like this.....? pic.twitter.com/oyYaspGHjL
@ttyalynn Hello Tya, none that we are currently aware of. You can follow/DM us your address/acct info and we can take a look.  ^TD
@Shawhelp you guys got some malfunction with your internet lately? #frustrated
@dannybeton Hi Danny, can you still DM us your address and suite#so we may check for updates in the area? ^TD
@dannybeton Glad to hear that you have some information on it. Let us know if anything changes.  ^TD
@dannybeton None that we are currently aware of. Can you DM us your address and suite #? Thanks. /^TD
@richmondchinese That sounds like a nice way to warm up to Wednesday! ^TD
@Para__Digm Good morning, we can definitely review that for your area. Can you please follow/DM us your address? ^TD
@Shawhelp internet is back up. Still waiting on internet 60, customer service is saying its not available but we are being throttled down.
@Shawhelp ok
@NOStradamusGG Hello there, can you please DM us your address and acct information so we may further assist you. ^TD
@Shawhelp still send flashing, online off
@Shawhelp ok I'll try that
@NOStradamusGG Good morning, can you do a power reset again? Unplug the modem for 30 seconds and plug it back in after that.  ^TD
@Shawhelp hey yesterday I accidently unplugged my modem and when I replugged it the send light is now blinking and the online light is off
@Shawhelp roger that!
@MrCanadian_ Good morning Dalton, can you DM us your address so we may take a look at it? Thanks. ^TD
@pamelaSsaunders Hello Pamela, can you please follow/DM us your address and account info so we may further assist you? Thanks. ^TD
@Shawhelp hey tony I have no internet, you busy?
@Shawhelp No internet in the New West Quay. It's been down since last night.
@SithLordYoda Coming soon. In the future. ^TD
@JayIsPainting @Kristinnuendo @outlaw73 Let us know if you need assistance. We can help! ^TD
@Shawhelp hi tony, has there been any Marty or Doc sightings yet?
@Kristinnuendo @outlaw73 I've had pretty decent help any time I've had an issue And @Shawhelp is way better than calling for most things
@Para__Digm Sorry to hear about that experience. Are you still experiencing a service interruption right now? Let us know. Thanks. ^TD
Good morning Twitterverse, do you do morning stretches? Tony signing on answering all tweets/DMs. Please let us know how we may assist you.
Hey @Shawhelp Maybe let people know before you shut internet down.... Scheduled maintenance is great if u let us know the schedule. #SMH
@Shawhelp k. No prob. Have a great night.
^Buddy signing off for the evening! We'll be back tomorrow morning at 7AM PDT. For overnight assistance, please call 1-888-472-2222.
@starkersinyeg 2/2 at 1-888-472-2222. We will be available again via Twitter at 7am PST tomorrow morning. ^Buddy
@starkersinyeg 1/2 Thank you, we are available until 10pm PST via Twitter. If you require immediate assistance, please contact us directly
@football_jimmy 2/2 immediate assistance. This is our Gateway Support line. We will be available again via Twitter at 7am PST tomorrow.
@Shawhelp I've done that multiple times pretty much every night. It never works. It's always an issue between 10-11pm.
@football_jimmy 1/2 Thank you as we are only available via Twitter until 10pm PST we recommend contacting us directly at 1-855-812-5090 for
@Shawhelp no. So far it's happened on 3 recordings from two channels. I guess it could have been broadcast that way.
@football_jimmy Hi there, is this happening with all recordings or specific recordings only? Thank you. ^Buddy
@Kristinnuendo 2/2 immediate assistance, we recommend contacting us at 1-888-472-2222. We will then be available again at 7am PST tomorrow.
@Kristinnuendo 1/2 Good evening, we are sorry to hear this is happening. We are available until 10pm PST via Twitter. If you require
@Shawhelp my gateway recordings' audio is out of sync. Is there any way to fix that?
@starkersinyeg 2/2 connection to the modem? Thank you. ^Buddy
@starkersinyeg 1/2 Good evening, we are sorry to hear this is happening. Are you experiencing these issues with both a direct and wireless
@starkersinyeg our internet is pretty much shit 80% of the time. @Shawhelp
@starkersinyeg us too. In fact every morning @outlaw73 is booted off wifi and manually has to reconnect. @Shawhelp
@Shawhelp Pretty much every evening around 10pm our Internet becomes so slow it's unusable.
Thanks @Shawhelp I didn't want to play tonight anyways pic.twitter.com/i5PrxQlAU8
@ConstiAIRA Hi there, we are sorry to hear this is happening. Please DM us either your full address or account number and we can help.^Buddy
@taraplantinga Thank you, please follow and DM us your account information and we can help with this. ^Buddy
@taraplantinga 2/2 service alerts and updates http:// bit.ly/shawupdate . ^Buddy
@Shawhelp yes
@taraplantinga 1/2 Good evening, are you still experiencing internet issues? Normally this is where we will posting information on outages,
@Shawhelp tried that doesn't work.Your website shows live outages?Is the website wrong?I hadn't looked further b/c I thought outages
@teebraady Hi there, we are sorry to hear this is happening. Please DM us either your full address or account number and we can help. ^Buddy
@Shawhelp VOD service issues in #yyc ? Getting error message that instructs us to call Shaw.
@taraplantinga Thanks! Have you tried unplugging the modem to reset it? If not, unplug for at least 30 seconds to reset. Thanks! ^TF
@Yvonnemc2 Have you tried unplugging the power on the box for 30 seconds? If not, give that a try and let us know if that doesn't help. ^TF
@Shawhelp just Internet
@Shawhelp thanks. I guess I don't get that one.
@taraplantinga Now aware of any issues in the area. Is cable down as well or just internet? ^TF
@mtcundall It should be on SN360 tonight, so channel 30 in SD and 231 in HD. ^TF
@Yvonnemc2 Not aware of any outages at the moment. Which services are you having trouble with? ^TF
@Shawhelp our shaw Internet has been down since Friday. We live in Abbotsford is there an outage?
@Shawhelp I can't find the Flames game. Nothing on 302. Help?!
@LindsayLobb Hi Lindsay, I'm not aware of any national outages. If you DM the phone #or address we can check for area issues. Thanks! ^TF
